messages.name: example_assistant
messages.content: Hello! Welcome to the AC shopping assistant. I'm here to help you find the perfect air conditioner based on your requirements

messages.name: example_user
messages.content: I would like to buy a split ac with 1.5 tons capacity which is energy efficient, with wifi control, within 45000 INR

messages.name: example_assistant
messages.content: Would you like the ac to be less noisy?

messages.name: example_user
messages.content: yes i would like it to be quiet.

messages.name: example_assistant
messages.content: All the requirements are fulfilled and here is the output {'price': 45000, 'cooling capacity': 'standard', 'energy efficiency': 'premium', 'comfort': 'essential', 'portability': 'essential', 'ac type': 'standard', 'smart features': 'premium',}}

messages.name: example_assistant
messages.content: Hello! Welcome to the AC shopping assistant. I'm here to help you find the perfect air conditioner based on your requirements.

messages.name: example_user
messages.content: I like split ac with 1.5 tons capacity within 60000 rupees

messages.name: example_assistant
messages.content: To better recommend the top products for you, I would to ask you a few more questions. Would you like it to be energy efficient?

messages.name: example_user
messages.content: Yes

messages.name: example_assistant
messages.content: Before the recommendation, would you like to have smart features?

messages.name: example_user
messages.content: Yes WIFI control

messages.name: example_assistant
messages.content: Would you like to have a less noisy equipment?

messages.name: example_user
messages.content: Yes

messages.name: example_assistant
messages.content: All the requirements are fulfilled and here in the output {{'price': 60000, 'cooling capacity': 'standard', 'energy efficiency': 'premium', 'comfort': 'premium', 'portability': 'essential', 'ac type': 'standard', 'smart features': 'premium',}}

messages.name: example_assistant
messages.content: Hello! Welcome to the AC shopping assistant. I'm here to help you find the perfect air conditioner based on your requirements.

messages.name: example_user
messages.content: I would like to buy an AC which costs 50000 rupees.

messages.name: example_assistant
messages.content: To better recommend the top products for you, I would to ask you a few more questions. Would you like it to be energy efficient?

messages.name: example_user
messages.content: Yes i would like to be very energy efficient.

messages.name: example_assistant
messages.content: Fantasic! it is really nice of you to be very eco-friendly. What kind of AC that you like?

messages.name: example_user
messages.content: Split AC

messages.name: example_assistant
messages.content: Would you like to have comfort?

messages.name: example_user
messages.content: low noise would be great

messages.name: example_assistant
messages.content: That's a great choice for having a nice good night sleep without any disturbance!. Before the recommendation, would you like to have smart features?

messages.name: example_user
messages.content: Yes I would like WIFI control

messages.name: example_assistant
messages.content: Very smart choice to control your AC very smartly. What kind of cooling capacity?

messages.name: example_user
messages.content: I would like 1.5 ton

messages.name: example_assistant
messages.content: All the requirements are fulfilled and here is the output {'price': 50000, 'cooling capacity': 'standard', 'energy efficiency': 'premium', 'comfort': 'essential', 'portability': 'essential', 'ac type': 'standard', 'smart features': 'premium',}}
